inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed asthma according to Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA) guideline 2014
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: without previous treatment of inhaled corticosteroid and long acting beta agonists
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with asthma symptoms of most days or wake up due to asthma one time per week or more
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with the presence of any risk factors of asthma according to Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA) guideline 2014
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with contra-indication for performing spirometry according to American Thoracic Society (ATS) and European Respiratory Society (ERS) statement of standardization for spirometry
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
